type.description: Specify the type of the minigame

minigame_tag.description: [string]The unique tag for this minigame, used for certain script calls to reference this minigame

completion_wait_time.description: The time to wait after this minigame is completed

ui_timer_offset.description: How the look of the timer should be offset as percent. If negative then will only scale the bar

interact_zone_index.description: The interact zone index that this minigame should be linked with

next_minigame_stage.description: Indicates which stage we should execute after this one, loopable minigames

value_alignment.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_ValueAlignment

stratagem_combo.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_StratagemCombo

hold_interact.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_HoldInteract

keypad_code.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_KeypadCodeEntry

grid_maze.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_GridMaze

switches.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_Switches

countdown.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_Countdown

pipe_slide.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_PipeSlide

charging.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_Charging

cannon_aiming_info.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_CannonAiming

wait_for_behavior.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_WaitForBehavior

wait_for_carry_delivery.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_WaitForCarryDelivery

wait_progress.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_WaitProgressTimer

external_switches.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_WaitForCarryDelivery

wait_objective_state.description: Settings used if the type is InteractableMinigameType_WaitObjectiveType
